page.title: 12RAUNDS PARK INFANTS SCHOOL
page.content: Park Infants School was built about 1907. There are about 120 children at the school. They celebrated their 75 anniversary in 1983. The teachers there are Mrs Croxon, Mrs Crawley, Mrs Wood, Mrs Bedborough and Mrs Morris, who is the headmistress. The children have to be there from 9.00am until 12.00 noon, and they come back in the afternoon from 1.15pm until 3.15pm. During dinner-time the children are looked after by Mrs Aucott, Mrs Smith and Mrs Gubbins. When the children start at the School, they are only 4 years old. They go for one week just in the morning and then the next week they go in the afternoon. The children at the school come from Raunds and Hargrave. The children have some "school" pets. They have some gerbils,fish and a frog.
